short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a copy button for FontAwesome search list

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple Chrome/Edge Chromium extension to improve productivity for developers and designers who use FontAwesome. It creates a copy button for all icons in the Search (listing) page.

- Add copy buttons to all icons on FontAwesome's listing pages. There are 4 copy modes you can choose from.
- Quickly open the search page, optionally with Free icons only checked.

All your options are saved.

Source Code and Build
This extension is free and open source under GNU License. For more information, feedback and donations, please visit the source repository on: https://github.com/datvm/CopyFontawesome
